short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces "Ibises" with "Ibi." The TRUE PLURAL FORM OF IBIS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This web extension scans your page for the word "Ibises" and changes it to the word "Ibi", the true plural form of the word "Ibis" ALL HAIL OUR LONG BEAKED OVERLORDS!!!
